recommended_advice: Great weather for hearty meals and moderate cooking. Enjoy balanced nutrition!
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4.. Butter a wide shallow 1.. 7-litre/3-pint ovenproof dish.. Put the butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, bicarbonate of soda and treacle into a mixing bow...
ingredients: Butter: 100g , Muscovado Sugar: 175g, Eggs: 2 large, Self-raising Flour: 225g, Baking Powder: 1 tsp , Bicarbonate Of Soda: 1 tsp , Black Treacle: 3 tb...
